title: Trump administration expands immigration restrictions, pausing applications from 19 nations
description: The Trump administration has halted all immigration applications (green cards, naturalization, asylum) from citizens of 19 non-European countries, citing national security risks and recent violent incidents involving foreign nationals. The policy escalates pr…
